**Title and Description**
Title | Translation, Unilingual or Comparative Revision, and Translation Updating
--------------------------------
Solicitation Number | 5000068561
GSIN | R109D (Translation Services)
---

**Background and Objective**

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) seeks to obtain translation (English to French and French to English) and unilingual or comparative revision and translation updating services to meet the current and growing needs of ECCC’s Communications Directorate. This service requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Service Requirements**

*   Translation (English to French and French to English) and unilingual or comparative revision and translation updating services
*   Security requirement at the Reliability level
*   Integrity Provisions as per section 01 of Standard Instructions 2003
*   Service Requirements for pension or lump sum payment beneficiaries as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation

**Trade Agreements and Social Procurement**

*   The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   ECCC supports the Government of Canada’s social and economic objectives, including increasing participation of businesses from under-represented groups in government procurement opportunities
